Description: Rectangular element of a border: with a dark-blue field, both surfaces matt. A series of palmettes in opaque white and red with pale-blue centres. The palmettes alternately face in opposite directions. Yellow tendrils or scrolls run from the base of a palmette to the base of the following palmette. A fine example of a well-known type.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.60)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
